cn.helloWhoAmI: 你好, 我叫赵庆, 一名热爱生活的程序员、前端开发工程师
introTxt: • 我时刻关注行业动态、具有较强的动手和学习能力
• 对新事物新技术充满好奇心，时刻保持钻研精神
• 具有良好的沟通及协调能力、逻辑分析能力
• 工作态度认真负责，具有高度的团队合作精神
• 乐于接受挑战，能够适应高强度压力的工作
• 曾在半个月内完成了公司扫码微信小程序的上线(包括服务器,域名,前后端代码的编写,UI的设计等全部工作);也曾在10天内从零开始学习Go语言,并且搭建了一个可用的Web服务器
• 积极乐观, 为人诚信
• 去年通过坚持锻炼,体重减轻了40斤,现在仍坚持每天健身至少1小时
cn.mailMe: 如果我有什么能够帮到你的话，请给我发邮件：
cn.messageSent: 信息已发送，谢谢，我会尽快与您联系！
cn.lifeMottoJobs: 致敬最疯狂的人们：格格不入，方枘圆凿，你们看得到我们看不到的世界。不拘于条框之束缚，不满于现状之安好，或贬或褒，却永远闪耀在我们的视野中，世界因你们而改变，沧海桑田，疯狂的人们前仆后继的成为人类进步的中流砥柱。人们说天才与疯子只有一线之隔，你们疯到认为自己可以翻覆这个世界，于是就跨过那条线，如此做了。
cn.lifeMottoGump: 人生就像是一盒巧克力,你永远不知道,下一颗是什么味道。
cn.car: 汽车鸣笛抓拍管理平台

cn.workSponTitle: 长沙世邦通信技术有限公司 前端开发工程师
workSponContent: • 全面负责公司Web前端相关业务, 包括前端框架的搭建, 及相关项目具体代码的(web前端及相关PHP, Go等后台)编写及维护等工作
• XC9000对讲、广播综合管理系统的开发(前端及PHP后台)
• 客户服务微信小程序的开发(十四天内完成程序上线, 包括: 服务器的搭建及前后端的编程)
• 多款设备的嵌入式Web程序开发(前端及PHP后台)
• 多款管理平台的开发(前端及Go,PHP等多种后台服务器程序)
• 智能音频分析管理平台的开发(Web前端以及Qt C++程序)
• 只在两天内使用Electron和Vue.js完成了一款公司内部使用的产品二维码生成软件
cn.sendSuccessContent: 非常感谢, 我会尽快跟您联系的

en.helloWhoAmI: Hello, I'm Andy Chao, a front-end engineer who enjoys the pleasures of life
introTxt: • I'm a curious software engineer with creative mind and willing to accept challenges.
• I made the Wechat Applet Available for users whitin just 14 days(Including server, domain, coding(front & back end), UI design, etc.)
• I also learnt the Go language from scratch in 10 days to build a useful web server
• I’m seeking a for job to make full use of these talents
• Last year, through continuous exercise, I lost 40 Jin of weight, and now I still keep on exercising for at least 1 hour a day
• Now let's start scrolling and learn more about me
en.mailMe: Is there anything I can do to help you, please let me know and mail me:
en.messageSent: The message has been sent successfully, thank you!
en.lifeMottoJobs: Here's to the crazy ones: the misfits, the rebels, the troublemakers, the round pegs in the square holes, the ones who see things differently. They are not fond of rules. They have no respect of status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do, is ignore them, because they change things. They push human race forward. Some may see them as the crazy ones. We see genius，because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world....are the ones who do.
en.lifeMottoGump: Life is like a box of chocalates, you never know what you gonna get.

en.workSponTitle: Changsha SPON Communication Technology Co., Ltd. - Software Engineer
workSponContent: • Full in charge of the company's Web front-end related works, including the construction of front-end framework, and the preparation and maintenance of specific code of related projects (WEB front-end and related back-end such as PHP, Go, etc);
• Development of xc9000 intercom and broadcast integrated management system (front-end and PHP back-end)
• Development of customer service wechat applet (publish the program online within 14 days, including the construction of server and the programming of front and back end)
• Embedded web program development for multiple devices (front end and PHP back end)
• Development of multiple management platforms (front-end and Go, PHP and other back-end server programs)
• Development of intelligent audio analysis management platform (Web and QT C++ program)
• Finished a product QR code generation software for internal use of the company within just 2 days
en.sendSuccessContent: Thank you so much, I'll get in touch with you ASAP.
